page.title: 07Dundrennan School Activities
page.content: During the school year several social gatherings are held.These generally involve raising money for the school fund.A coffee evening held in November provides an evening out for a large number of the community.As well as serving coffee,the P.T.A.runs several stalls and raffles. Another great attraction is the concerts performed by the children.These are usually at Christmas and at the end of the summer term.School funds have just provided a stage for the children to make their performances even more enjoyable. When it comes to party time at Hallowe'en or Christmas,everyone joins in.Santa and Rudolph are supplied by the guards at the local M.O.D.range. The school is also used as a Polling Station.
